member.name: IMFMediaEngineEME.get_Keys
member.summary: Gets the media keys object associated with the media engine or null if there is not a media keys object.
member.param: The media keys object associated with the media engine or null if there is not a media keys object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEME.SetMediaKeys
member.summary: Sets the media keys object to use with the media engine.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFMediaEngineEME
member.summary: Implemented by the media engine to add encrypted media extensions methods.
